title: ERA-20C

url.description: ERA-20C is ECMWF's first atmospheric reanalysis of the 20th century, from 1900-2010. It assimilates observations of surface pressure and surface marine winds only.
url.name: ERA-20C

abstract: ERA-20C is the European Centre for Medium Range Weather Forcecasts (ECMWF)'s first atmospheric reanalysis of the 20th century, from 1900-2010.  It assimilates observations of surface pressure and surface marine winds only.
context: ERA-20C is ECMWF's first atmospheric reanalysis of the 20th century.
